metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2571 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the quiz_question_tostringfunction in mod/quiz/editlib.php in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before2.4.9, 2.5.x before 2.5.5, and 2.6.x before 2.6.2 allows remoteauthenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a quizquestion.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
